meanings.definition: The character and atmosphere of a place
meanings.sent1: The cozy ambience of the cafe made me feel relaxed.
meanings.sent2: The ambience of the forest was peaceful and serene.
meanings.sent3: The spooky ambience of the haunted house was surprisingly inviting.
meanings.sent4: The ambience of the bustling city was like a symphony of sounds and lights.
meanings.sent5: The ambience of the beach at sunset was truly magical.

meanings.definition: The mood or feeling of a particular environment
meanings.sent1: The festive ambience of the party put everyone in a joyful mood.
meanings.sent2: The ambience of the library was quiet and studious.
meanings.sent3: The romantic ambience of the candlelit dinner set the perfect mood for love.
meanings.sent4: The ambience of the rainy day matched my melancholic mood.
meanings.sent5: The ambience of the concert hall was filled with excitement and anticipation.
